sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <the-loader
      v-if="!isLoaded"
    />
    <provider>
      <transition
        name="fade"
        appear
        mode="out-in"
      >
        <layout />
      </transition>
    </provider>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import "@fontsource/montserrat";
import "@fontsource/alkalami"
import Provider from "@/context/Provider.vue";
import TheLoader from "@/components/TheLoader.vue";

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    Provider,
    TheLoader
  },
  async mounted() {
    const layoutName = this.$route.meta.layout || "DefaultPageLayout.vue";
    console.log(layoutName);
    import(`@/layouts/page/${layoutName}`).then((response) => {
      this.isLoaded = true;
      this.layout = () => response;
    });
  },
  computed: {
    async setLayout() {
      //@ts-ignore

    },
  },
  data: () => ({
    isLoaded: false,
    layout: ""
  }),
};
</script>
